Description of incident: Ken Waterman, CPA notified customers of a data breach when the company noticed unauthorized access to their servers that contained personal information of their customers."On March 30, 2016, KW learned that a possible security incident may have impacted the security of information stored on our servers.  We immediately began and investigation and engaged independent, third-party forensic computer experts to assist.  While the investigation is still ongoing, it appears that files stored on our system may have been accessed by an unauthorized individual.  These files contain information related to your tax filings, and may have included your name, address, Social Security number, wage information, and in some instances bank account information."More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-61628
